message.name: ERR_POSITIONREPORTINGLINK_RV_ORGSTRUCTURE_CANCELED
message.locale: A position cannot report to any position within a canceled organization structure.
A position cannot report to any position within a cancelled organisation structure.

message.name: ERR_POSITIONREPORTINGLINK_RV_REPORTSTOPOSITION_CANCELED
message.locale: Position cannot report to a canceled position.
Position cannot report to a cancelled position.

message.name: ERR_POSITIONREPORTINGLINK_XRV_POSITION_ALREADY_ASSIGNED
message.locale: This position already has a reporting position assigned.

message.name: ERR_POSITIONREPORTINGLINK_XRV_POSITION_NOT_ASSIGNED
message.locale: This position does not report to any position.

message.name: ERR_POSITIONREPORTINGLINK_XRV_POSITION_REPORTSTOITSELF
message.locale: A position cannot report to itself.

message.name: ERR_POSITIONREPORTINGLINK_XRV_ALREADY_CANCELED
message.locale: This position has already been removed as the reporting position.
